about_the_game:
Onto a musical journey into the Far north we shall take you ...

Enhanced UnReal World soundtrack brings you the game musics plus three selected spin-off hit songs along the way in both .mp3 and lossless audio formats.
The soundtrack features music composed and performed by the very devs themselves - Sami Maaranen (creator) and Erkka lehmus (co-designer) - between the period of 2013-2023. For the so-called Kalevala melody featured in the unforgettable theme song we are to thank featuring Kantele musician Lani K. Thompson.

All the tracks have been re-mastered for the purpose, and there is a one fresh song (Into The Far North) exclusively created to be premiered on this soundtrack. With all the tracks mainly played with authentic traditional instruments, including human voice, this is a primeval musical journey into the far north.

The soundtrack ends with 41 minute long shamanistic frame drum driven journey, which can be also looped. In the game we hear variety of shorter clips selected from this massive track, but it also works nicely as an independent background music for many kind of meditative sessions.

name: UnReal World Enhanced Soundtrack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 134 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 272 MB available space

short_description: This enhanced +3 soundtrack contains the musics from the game with addition of three selected spin-off hit songs along the way. Composed and performed by the very devs themselves and played with traditional Finno-Ugric musical instruments it's a primeval musical journey into the far north.
